main.div:
Welcome to Shitmore High School.
Aspiring to Excellence.

div.class: block block-image col-12 col-md-6 eh order-md-2

div.p:
This is not the Whitmore Website
If You Would Like To Visit the Real Website Click Here

The way we treat people.
DONT TICKLE MR ROBINSONS FEET
Mr Robinsons Number: 01446 740325.
Respect and that.
The way we work together.

div.div:
Whitmore High School
Port Road West
Barry
CF62 7FG
